features: 📲【6.5-inch Large Screen & Smart-K Box Speaker】📲 Blackview WAVE 6C smart phone features a 6.52-inch display with a smooth 60Hz refresh rate (720*1600), providing a more comfortable viewing experience. High-fidelity colors, clear images, and Smart-K box speaker technology make movies and games more exciting. Enjoy full viewing angles, 10-point touch technology, and enjoy the joyful moments brought by this cheap phones unlocked anytime, anywhere.

🌟【Ultra-Slim Body, 191g Weight & With Free TPU Protective Case】🌟 The Blackview WAVE 6C unlocked smartphones stands out with its ultra-light and thin design, boasting a mere 9.7mm thickness and a weight of 191g. It adopts a unique gradient design made by an all-new exquisite spray coating process - presenting gorgeous color gradients in the simple back panel, making your style more distinctive and personality more prominent, making it a compelling choice for you. There's more! Blackview WAVE 6C unlocked phones is packed with free TPU protective case, and the soft TPU materials can significantly reduce damage and provide extra protection.

🔋【5100mAh Powerful Battery Cellphone】🔋 Go from dawn to dusk and beyond with the WAVE 6C's 5100mAh mega battery. Enjoy all-day worry-free use with up to 7 hours of continuous video or up to 35 hours of music playback or up to 792 hours of standby. Additionally, an improved smart battery system maximizes energy efficiency based on your needs and reduces battery loss by 15%. What's more, WAVE 6C unlocked phones can also be used as a power bank to charge other devices through the USB OTG function.

✅【The Latest Android 13 & Doke OS 4.0 System】✅ The Wave 6C Android phones come equipped with the latest Android 13 GO operating system, enhancing privacy and personalization for a seamless work and play experience. This Android 13 GO android phones offers per-app language preferences, a data migration assistant, cleared clipboard history, and notification permissions. There's more! But that's not all! With the integration of Doke OS 4.0 Go, enjoy additional functionalities like call recording and exercise index tracking. Additionally, explore easy sharing, real-time subtitles, and more exciting features and optimizations!

🚀【Octa-core Processor & 1TB Expandable】🚀 Blackview WAVE 6C android phones is feature an Octa-core Processor, which is capable of running multiple applications and multitasking in a smooth, responsive and efficient manner for your productivity and entertainment needs. WAVE 6C mobile phone uses advanced RAM expansion technology to upgrade RAM to 4GB with just one click, allowing you to run multiple applications at the same time and switch easily. 32GB of built-in storage provides enough space to install apps and store files. The dedicated Micro SD slot supports up to 1TB of external storage.

📷【Capture Every Wonderful Moment】📷Blackview WAVE 6C mobile phone is equipped with an 8MP ultra-clear main camera, every photo delivers incredible detail and vivid color. The 5MP front camera allows you to take vivid selfies. Simultaneously, 1080P video recording can exceed your imagination. Whether it is mountains, rivers or trees, it can present realistic colors and rich textures. The WAVE 6C smartphone is a stylish and powerful cheap cell phones unlocked suitable for everyone.

💖【2 Years Warranty Service + Multi-Function】💖 Our shop guarantees all Blackview phones for 2 years. Should any issues arise, reach out to us for prompt assistance. This 4G dual sim phone features 3 card slots, accommodating 2 nano SIM cards + 1 micro SD/TF card (SIM/SD not included). Support Face ID Unlock. Benefit from GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo navigation.

📶【Please Read Before Purchasing】📶Blackview WAVE 6C unlocked smartphones support 4G networks, compatible with GSM carriers like T-mobile, Speedtalk, Mint Mobile, BTC, MetroPCS, H2O, Movistar, Telcel, Tigo, Claro, Ultra Mobile, Tello, Bell Wireless, Rogers Wireless, Chatr, Telus, Fido, FIZZ, and more. (❌Not compatible with CDMA carriers such as AT&T, Cricket Wireless, Verizon, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular) 🔔🔔Support Network: 4G FDD: B2/B3/B4/B5/B7/B12/B13/B17/B26/B66; 3G WCDMA: B2/B4/B5 ; 2G GSM: 850/900/1800/1900 (B2/B3/B5/B8).

reviews.reviewTitle: Gran terminal a un precio muy competitivo
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. He comprado el Blackview Wave 6C hace un mes y estoy muy satisfecho con mi compra. Es un móvil que ofrece unas prestaciones muy buenas por un precio muy razonable. Aquí os cuento lo que más me ha gustado de este smartphone.Lo que más me ha gustadoLa memoria y el procesador: El móvil tiene una memoria de 4 GB (2 Gb físicos y 2 virtuales), suficiente para que el móvil funcione rápido y fluido, sin retrasos ni bloqueos. Además, el procesador ARM Cortex A55 permite ejecutar varias aplicaciones al mismo tiempo sin problemas. La capacidad de almacenamiento de 32 GB es más que suficiente para guardar fotos, vídeos, música y documentos. Además, se puede ampliar con una tarjeta microSD de hasta 1 TB.La pantalla: El móvil tiene una pantalla de 6.52 pulgadas con resolución HD+. La pantalla es muy nítida, brillante y con unos colores vivos. La pantalla es ideal para jugar, ver películas o navegar por internet.Las cámaras: El móvil tiene una cámara trasera principal de 8 MP y una cámara frontal de 5 MP. Las cámaras son muy buenas y capturan imágenes con mucho detalle y colores reales.La batería y el cargador: El móvil tiene una batería de 5100 mAh, que dura bastante y permite un uso intensivo. La batería se carga rápidamente con el cargador de 10 W, que viene incluido en la caja. El móvil también tiene un modo de ahorro de energía, que se puede activar cuando se necesita alargar la autonomía.El diseño: El móvil tiene un diseño bastante similar a los de otros dispositivos de más de 1000€. El cuerpo es plástico y metálico y no es muy grande ni pesado, lo que facilita su manejo con una sola mano. He de mencionar no obstante, que el móvil no es resistente al agua ni al polvo, lo que limita su uso en ciertas condiciones.El sistema operativo: El móvil tiene el sistema Doke 4 (basado en Android 13), que es el más reciente y tiene algunas ventajas, como una interfaz más inteligente, una optimización del sistema más potente y una mayor protección de la privacidad.ConclusiónEl Blackview Wave 6C es un móvil que ofrece unas prestaciones muy buenas por un precio muy razonable. Es un móvil potente, versátil y económico, que se adapta a las necesidades de diferentes usuarios. Tiene una memoria y un procesador excelentes, un audio de alta calidad, una pantalla nítida y fluida y unas cámaras muy buenas. En general, es un móvil que recomiendo, sobre todo si buscas un móvil con una buena relación calidad-precio.Espero que mi opinión os haya resultado de utilidad. Gracias por leerme.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein echtes Juwel zu einem unschlagbaren Preis!
reviews.reviewText: Das Blackview Wave 6C hat mich von Anfang an beeindruckt und übertrifft alle Erwartungen. Das Farbverlauf-Sprühdesign verleiht dem Smartphone eine ansprechende Ästhetik. Das schlanke Gehäuse mit einem Gewicht von 191g, einer Dicke von 9mm und dem abgerundeten Eckendesign sorgt nicht nur für eine elegante Optik, sondern auch für einen äußerst angenehmen Griff.Die Akkuleistung des Blackview Wave 6C ist beeindruckend. Der 5100 mAh bietet 816 Stunden Standby und man kann das Smartphone 1-2 Tage lang intensiv nutzen. Die Unterstützung von zwei 4G-SIM-Karten, Breitband und die Kompatibilität mit allen europäischen Betreibern machen es zu einem verlässlichen Begleiter auf Reisen. Die GPS+GLONASS+Beidou-Funktion bietet zudem einen präzisen Standort, sodass ich mich stets sicher fühle.Der 6,52-Zoll-Bildschirm mit 720 x 1600 Auflösung ist völlig ausreichend. Die Vielfalt der Farbmodi liefert lebendige und authentische Bilder. Die 8-Megapixel-Hauptkamera ermöglicht fantastische Aufnahmen, sei es im 360°-Panorama, Zeitraffer, Audiobild oder im Porträtmodus. Die zahlreichen Aufnahmemodi eröffnen kreative Möglichkeiten und machen die Kamera sehr funktional.Der erweiterbare Speicher, in Kombination mit dem Octa-Core-Prozessor, ermöglicht ein reibungsloses Multitasking ohne Verzögerungen. Mit 32 GB internem Speicher und der Möglichkeit, extern bis zu 1TB hinzuzufügen, ist das Smartphone ideal für Content-Ersteller. Das Android 13 Smartphone mit neuestem Update und Datenschutzkontrolle sorgt für eine zukunftsweisende Kompatibilität und eine optimale Leistung. Doke OS bietet eine anpassbare Benutzeroberfläche und reaktionsschnelle Interaktion, was das Gesamterlebnis noch besser macht.Der Preis von 79,99 Euro im Sonderangebot bei Amazon macht das Blackview Wave 6C nicht nur preiswert, sondern zu einem regelrechten Schnäppchen. Ich kann dieses Smartphone jedem empfehlen, der nach einem funktionsreichen und ästhetisch ansprechenden Gerät zu einem erschwinglichen Preis sucht.Es gefällt mir auch sehr gut, dass genau die Schutzhülle schon dabei ist, die ich sonst immer extra kaufen musste. Ebenso ist eine Display Schutzfolie schon drauf.Ich habe Handys, die ein paar hundert Euro kosten, die kein bisschen besser sind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: It runs smoothly, has good quality, and has long battery life.
reviews.reviewText: The phone is very good, the material is suitable and wear-resistant. The camera function of the mobile phone is also good and relatively clear, and the display screen is large enough and very clear. Secondly, the phone feels very light in the hand and feels good in the hand. It is smoother to use and has no lag. The delivery logistics was also very fast, it arrived in 2 days. In short, the mobile phone is good and suitable for the elderly. It is worth buying. If there is any problem, I will contact you again. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A handy smartphone. It looks premium quality and works perfectly for me as a second phone. With up to 4GB RAM and 32GB ROM, I am getting a smooth experience and a decent amount of storage space.It has a decent sized battery capacity at 5100mAh, which keeps my phone running for over a day on a single charge - especially seeing as I am not gaming or watching videos on it. The inclusion of a Type-C charging port and 10W fast charging capability adds convenience and efficiency to daily tasks.The 6.5" smooth screen with a waterdrop design offers a delightful visual experience. The outstanding camera features, including an 8MP main camera with enhanced image processing algorithms, deliver sharp and lifelike photos. The dual 4G capability and compatibility with all UK operators make it a versatile choice for users.In conclusion, it stands out in the budget smartphone segment, offering a reliable performance, impressive battery life, and a feature-rich camera system. It's a great option for users seeking a cost-effective and versatile smartphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good budget friendly phone that offers a lot for your money. This phone was purchased for my dad and therefore I wanted to get a phone that was easy to use, cheap but still be compatible with modern apps.This phone is extremely easy to use thanks to the Android OS. We managed to set it up in only a few minutes.The phone is fast and has a nice large responsive screen that is bright and great for viewing everything from YouTube to reading emails.The camera system is more than adequate for a phone of this price range and takes very clear images and video.Overall my dad is very pleased with this phone and for the following reasons I’ve decided to rate it 5 stars:Easy to set up and useFastNice screenExcellent battery life and charge times
